name: Cream of Mushroom Chicken
author: VENECIA
summary: This is a delicious chicken recipe for the whole family. You can serve it with white rice or potatoes if desired.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 ¼ cups water, or as needed
2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed
directions: In a large saucepan, melt the butter/margarine
Add the soup, water and milk
Add the onion, salt and pepper and bring all to a boil
When mixture starts boiling, add the chicken meat and simmer all together until chicken is cooked through
Add the sliced mushrooms and boil over medium heat for about 5 minutes, stirring often
